messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Art & Stories (was: Re: RK removed from CN program schedule)
messages.msgSnippet: Ah okay! I m very glad you told me. ^_^ I do have a story in progress, actually. ^^ It s In Your Shadow I Walk, a SAISA pairing story. But I also have another
messages.messageBody:
Ah okay! I'm very glad you told me. ^_^
I do have a story in progress, actually. ^^ It's In Your Shadow I Walk, a
SAISA pairing story.
But I also have another one which is called Moonlit Destiny, it's also with
the SAISA pairing, but a cross over with my yaoi manga Demonic Obsessions.
^^
And then there's another story, called In Eternity and Forever, which I
finished and has been submitted to Nekkie's Ratnest for the fanfiction
challenge, it's also a crossover with Demonic Obsessions...not a bad one,
I'd say.

And thank you for complimenting my artwork. I'm very glad you think I draw
well. I can honestly draw much, much better than the ones you've seen thus
far. It's just sometimes I can do things that look awesome, and then I have
days were nothing will look right.
(An example? http://www.deviantart.com/view/6623911/ )

Okay, I'm done shamelessly promoting myself now. *droops head*

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."


-------

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "Misery Mirror" <misery_mirror@h...>
wrote:

>>Hehehe, anyway, I'm lacking in brains, but I do have an artistic
talent. So
I'll probably be sending little gifts for the members of this group
once in
a while. Hopefully that'll make up for probably never being able to
help
with information gathering.<<

Just a little reminder that artwork, whether stories or graphics,
should be posted over on shq_spy_division so we can keep the files
here as factual as possible. :-D

To my fellow wolves here, Miser Bellatrix does some wonderful artwork
and also writes (Miser, don't you have one in progress? Or am I
confusing you with someone else?). Definitely NOT lacking in brains!!

phil (who woke up to 91 messages in her inbox, including several
copies of a reply from Yahoo apologizing, but nothing they could do
until they get the bug fixed... time to reconfigure all my lists...
grrr... )

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: RK removed from CN program schedule
messages.msgSnippet: I saw all the episodes from the beginning to the end of the kyoto arc, but no more than that. I was somewhat hoping they d re-show those episodes, so I could
messages.messageBody:
I saw all the episodes from the beginning to the end of the kyoto arc, but
no more than that.
I was somewhat hoping they'd re-show those episodes, so I could tape the
ones were Saitou shows his cute butt (*laughs*) for the first time, but they
stopped and it pissed me off....
I filed in a complaint, too. ^^

By the way, I'm new here to this group. Sorry for dropping in the middle of
a discussion without a proper introduction.
So I go by the name Miser Bellatrix, but you can call me whatever you want.
I have yet to look through all the information here, but I'm certainly very
interested. The Shinsengumi caught my interest when I first fell in love
with *cough* Saitou, and ever since I've been obsessed.

...So I don't social much, so what?

Hehehe, anyway, I'm lacking in brains, but I do have an artistic talent. So
I'll probably be sending little gifts for the members of this group once in
a while. Hopefully that'll make up for probably never being able to help
with information gathering.

Miser Bellatrix

"Allow me to give you a hand...with your doom."

_________________________________________________________________

Travel Guide! http://special.msn.com/local/springtravel.armx

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Re: RK removed from CN program schedule
messages.msgSnippet: They had finished the Kyoto arc, they left off on episode 24 and I know...I sent CN a feedback...I ve seen the final showdown with Shishio... Warg3791@****
messages.messageBody:
They had finished the Kyoto arc, they left off on episode 24 and I know...I sent CN a feedback...I've seen the final showdown with Shishio...

Warg3791@... wrote:In a message dated 4/14/2004 1:17:17 PM Eastern Standard Time,
mg_batt@... writes:
I don't know how far Cartoon Network got into Kenshin... What episode
did it stop? Did they even finish the Kyoto arc? Personally, for me
if it did I'd rather have the anime stop right there as I've always
felt it went downhill after especially towards the end... If they
didn't even do the Kyoto arc yet, then yeah, I'd definitely be upset.
They showed the Kyoto arc...Once. Last summer. That was it. And I missed the
final showdown with Shishio! That's why I got mad and rounded the entire thing
up on DVD. They were too slow about showing anything. Now they're not even
going to show it a second time (at least not yet). EVIL CN.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: RK removed from CN program schedule
messages.msgSnippet: Even if they have brought RK back in the past, it still can t hurt to let them know there are people out here interested in it.  (And eventually, they *will*
messages.messageBody:
Even if they have brought RK back in the past, it still can't hurt to
let them know there are people out here interested in it. (And
eventually, they *will* decide to quit showing it... ) And I think
it can't hurt to bring up PMK in association with it. May fall on
completely deaf ears, but stranger things have happened. :-D

phil (who's always afraid she's gonna hit the 'send' button
accidentally)

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] RK removed from CN program schedule
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/14/2004 12:55:02 PM Eastern Standard Time, Warg3791@**** writes: I m wondering if this is even a permanent thing though. They never
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/14/2004 12:55:02 PM Eastern Standard Time,
Warg3791@... writes:
I'm wondering if this is even a permanent thing though. They never showed the
Kyoto arc but once. Maybe they intend to move it around later? Include it in
the Adult Swim line-up at some point? They do that sort of thing all the time
with their other anime. I wouldn't be a bit surprised to see it turn up again
soon anyway. I finally gave up on them myself. I'm slowing gather
I was going to say slowy gathering the loose change from my sofa cushions,
etc. to buy the final episodes I don't have. Sorry! I accidently hit the button
to send it off prematurely!!! My bad!
-a very ashamed MissBehavin.

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] RK removed from CN program schedule
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/14/2004 12:13:22 PM Eastern Standard Time, spiritus_saitou@*... writes: Forwarding this message just in case anyone s interested in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/14/2004 12:13:22 PM Eastern Standard Time,
spiritus_saitou@... writes:
Forwarding this message just in case anyone's interested in helping get RK
back onto the program schedule of Cartoon Network. They've cut it up so badly,
I'd like to see them just put it back into the primetime Toonami schedule
(which is how I first started watching it).
I'm wondering if this is even a permanent thing though. They never showed the
Kyoto arc but once. Maybe they intend to move it around later? Include it in
the Adult Swim line-up at some point? They do that sort of thing all the time
with their other anime. I wouldn't be a bit surprised to see it turn up again
soon anyway. I finally gave up on them myself. I'm slowing gather


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: RK removed from CN program schedule
messages.msgSnippet: Forwarding this message just in case anyone s interested in helping get RK back onto the program schedule of Cartoon Network.  They ve cut it up so badly, I d
messages.messageBody:
Forwarding this message just in case anyone's interested in helping get RK back onto the program schedule of Cartoon Network. They've cut it up so badly, I'd like to see them just put it back into the primetime Toonami schedule (which is how I first started watching it).

phil
To: rurouni-love@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tue, 13 Apr 2004 21:13:49 -0000
Subject: [rurouni-love] Bad news....

If you haven't heard already, RK has been taken off Cartoon
Network!!!!!!

I don't know how many of you watch it on Cartoon Network, but I know
a few people who do.

Please help us by contacting the network and telling them that we
don't want them to take Kenshin away!!!!

Contact them by filling out the feedback form on this webpage!!!!

http://www.cartoonnetwork.com/gen/help/index.html

Please help us who watch it on cartoon network!!!

---------------------------------
Do you Yahoo!?
Yahoo! Tax Center - File online by April 15th
